reviewText: There was something fishy when the WT 7 building fell in a free fall without even being hit. This was a set-up. I just hope it was a set-up by the bad guys!

I don't think that I am any less of an American or unpatriotic anyway, because I have serious doubts as to the explanation of why those two towers fell in the manner that they did. Also the third building World Trade Center number seven I believe was not even hit by a plane and it collapsed in a similar matter when did a high-rise building ever collapse onto itself in a matter similar to implosion because of the fire there are two examples of terrible fires in high-rise buildings one in Philadelphia, and one in Madrid Spain and neither of those buildings collapsed onto themselves. I don't think that anyone should feel ashamed or un-American because they question the government's explanation of those buildings collapsing just watch the film and take away from it whatever you want but it does bring up many interesting topics that are difficult for a scientific explanation thanking you in advance respectfully Johnny Irish

WAKE UP AMERICA ....

There is so much going on under your very noses

This is only one of the things YOUR Government does, to do it's part in ruling (or trying to), this planet

WAKE UP AMERICA ...

Do you really think those rich people, who live for money and power, really care how many of US commoners they kill in their efforts

My apologies for laughing out loud ...

This documentary reveals as much information as possible to help one determine actual events on September 11th.  I for one will be forever skeptical about 3 perfectly well constructed modern skyscrapers collapsing in rubble and dust from the collision of two planes, equipped with no weapons, only jet fuel, after a short time with limited fires burning on extremely remote floors!  Watch for  yourself and wonder with me.

I found the assertion far fetched at first, but was open minded enough to let the evidence speak for itself.

I've also seen Popular mechanics (week) rebutle and frankly those guys should be embarassed. They tout themselves as a journal of science, and most of their counter points were no more than a scoff or scowl.

Three college kids put together a rather compelling case and intellectually destroyed a well established science magazine.

I now believe 9/11 was an inside job.
LOOSE CHANGE is something every American should see. This information needs to be spread across America to every household. No home should be without this valuable information.

I personally don't understand how anybody who sees this DVD can possibly believe 9/11 was planned and executed by some terrorist living in a cave somewhere.  This attack was much too suphisticated in the planning and execution for someone who is only one generation away from living in a black tent and riding camels.

Watch this on YouTube and save your hard-earned dough, this is further evidence that 9/11 conspiracies may indeed be a conspiracy by conspiracy theorists to profit off conspiracy theories of events witnessed by thousands in broad daylight.  Then, watch some dudes from Popular Mechanics destroy the professional 9/11 experts who made this documentary on an episode of Democracy Now.  Then, expect some guys in black suits to come to your home and remind you to keep quiet.
At first I thought it was hard to take the concept of our government doing this seriously.  This was a sobering look at what went on that day.

why aren't the Bush & his idiots in prison?  this sure is cool and I have seen others on youtube that says basically no planes went into the towers that all people really saw were the explosions and thought planes then we have holograms of planes going into the towers by film that was suppose to be taken at the time .. none had the first plane and who knows what for the second.  I also read that all of the buildings came down at this plaza, like the towers plus 7 that we found out later, then 3 , 4, 5 and last but not least the scooped out building 6 that looks like a big suction cup sucked out or scooped out the entire center of that building.  So the entire plaza was cleared out ready for new buildings.. whoa what a long strange trip we are on

I had a copy on DVD of the first original Loose Change (lent it to somebody and it "disappeared") and I really liked it, and this version is good too.  The real kicker for me has always been how these steel and concrete skyscrapers just "collapsed" pancake style in about 10 seconds - controlled demolition-style at that.  Hint, hint.  I had another DVD I lent out (never got it back either!) and that whole DVD (by another person) was on how these type of buildings just DO NOT collapse because of fire.  Uh-huh.

Honestly, I never did buy the "official" story on what happened on 9/11 - never will either.  This documentary will help you to see that there's a rat in the woodpile.

After watching this dvd I don't know how anyone can still believe the 3 towers were brought down by the airplanes and fire. My husband was a professional Fire Fighter and use to tell tell me fire did not bring down those towers. I never believed him. The one thing that I never felt comfortable about was how there was nothing left after the buildings came. People were lining up to donate blood and there was no one to give it to. Everything was just dust. Then I went to a talk with him to hear that Richard Gage was giving. After that I had not doubt that terrorists did not bring down the 3 towers. I too believe every American should watch this.
Asks the questions that every American needs to ask. I wish for the answers, however they are well hidden.
a must see ... hard to not question what we've been told about 9/11 after viewing
intresting

...you'll have no problem believing that of all the left wing liberal journalists (e.g., Dan Rather, Mike Wallace, Woodward and Bernstein, and the legendary Seymour Hersh) who would have given their testicles for a chance to destroy George W. Bush, three 20-year olds from upstate New York end up breaking the biggest story since the frikkin' virgin birth.

Got that? The story that, if true, would have plunged a screaming chain saw through the chest of the entire Republican Party and handed this country over to the Democrats on a silver plate FOREVER was discovered and revealed by three Gen-X basement dwellers who photo-shopped their little indie picture on a PC in grandma's basement.

You don't need to convict him in a real court...just the court of public opinion. If a respectable member (or members) of the established journalism media can convince the public that GWB and/or the Republican machine was responsible for 9/11, then the elephant dies. It dies. No more right wing in the US...the wet dream of all lefties.

...and who comes to the fight? Three weed heads and a video so full of logical holes it could pass for a brick of Swiss cheese.

If you are capable of believing that three nobodies from nowhere have more connections and political insight than Seymour Hersh, then you're capable of believing that Tom Cruise killed Abraham Lincoln, that Katy Perry was the first astronaut to walk on the moon, and Pee-Wee Herman was the mastermind behind the Holocaust.
An amazing documentary showing facts on how much is hidden & all about the money. A must see for every American.

Not good for sheeple who can't handle the truth. I find it impossible how any logical, objective-minded person cannot take this evidence at face value and question the "official story"  of that horrible event. The fact that we even have to have an "official story" vs any other variation of what actually happened should raise a red flag. If you can't handle the truth don't watch this! Go back to watching football or reading Justin Beiber and Miley Cyrus articles.

A MUST watch  video  about what has  happened  in  our country,
most  of  the  information  is  rock  solid, riveting, if  it  is  the  first time  you  have seen  this  information
it  may  seem  unbelievable, but the  more  you  research  with  an  open  mind the  less you can  resist  the  obvious  truth,
pass  this  info  along,  while  it  it  still  available

This is the real deal.  Dylan Avery and his crew were brave in the face of this mountain of lies.  You had better wake up WORLD.  It is our burden to untangle what happened, but you must be brave and take on this issue within yourself.  Serious minds can break the hypnotic spell that the repetition of lies casts on your brain.  You must resist the over-layering of misinformation that leads you away from the truth.  Chris Bollyn is a good person to listen to as well as ARCHITECTS AND ENGINEERS FOR 911 TRUTH.  You all cannot just let the sheeple be cowards. confront the ignorance with facts (microscopic spheres of spattered iron from liquification when the thermite reactions were detonated.)  End the wars by ending the lies!!!!
This is the best documentary ever.
There are somethings in this that are very far fetched, on the other hand there are somethings that make you go hmmmm.

I cannot believe they showed this to my child in school. Looking at conspiracy "theories", they pass this crap off as gospel truth. What a show of disrespect to EVERYONE, beside the pack of thug terrorists, who lost their lives in those horrible attacks!!!
Wake up people !!
No matter what you believe about 911.  You need to open your mind and watch this.  Don't be a sheeple.
There was a lot of new content. It was well thought out. I liked it
boneheaded
